description:
Take control of your money and tax with the HMRC app
It’s secure, free to download, and easy to use. Get on it, and join millions of people already saving time with the HMRC app.
Key Features: 
- Quick setup: sign in using face recognition, fingerprint scan, or a six-digit PIN 
- Stay in control: check your tax code and see your pay before it even shows in your bank, so you know you're paying the right amount
- Claim a tax refund: find out if you’re due any tax back from us and quickly claim a refund if you’re owed one 
- Check your State Pension: see how much State Pension you could get, when you can get it and how to increase it, if you can 
- Self Assessment: a safe and secure way to make Self Assessment payments and get information you'll need to file 
- Child Benefit support: claim, manage, and update your Child Benefit details 
- National Insurance: find and save your National Insurance number so you have it when you need it 
- Go paperless: opt to receive key messages from HMRC online

Download the HMRC app today and stay on top of your money and taxes

MAKE YOUR MONEY MORE MONZO

Hi, we're Monzo – a bank that lives on your phone.

Numbers are kind of our thing. Here are a few of our favourites:

• 11 million: how many people bank with us
• 10: the minutes it takes to open a personal or business bank account (you can use the Current Account Switch Service too)
• 24/7: the hours and days you can chat to our customer support

You'll need a Monzo current account to access Investments, Instant Access Savings Pots and Monzo Flex Credit Card.


GET TO KNOW WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES

• Get instant notifications when money comes in and out of your account
• Learn about your spending habits with weekly and monthly insights
• Schedule your bills or regular monthly payments and manage subscriptions
• Get that payday feeling one business day early when your salary is paid via Bacs
• Free yourself from travel fees. Pay anywhere and in any currency on your debit or credit card. (We pass Mastercard's exchange rate directly onto you, without any hidden fees.)


SUPERCHARGE YOUR SAVINGS WITH POTS

• Create personalised Pots to separate your spending money and savings
• Turn your spare change into savings with automatic roundups
• Earn interest on your money with Savings Pots

SPLIT AND PAY THE MONZO WAY

• Split bills, send payment reminders, and keep track of joint costs
• Easily request money or make payments with a link (limits apply, £500 for requesting money and £250 for making payments with a link)

MONZO INVESTMENTS: LEAVE THE HARD WORK TO US

You must be over 18 years old to use this feature.

• Choose from 3 investment options based on the level of risk you’re happy with
• Start with as little as £1
• Grow your investing know-how with bite-sized topics on investing essentials
• The value of your investments may go up or down. You could get back less than you put in.



MONZO FLEX: AN AWARD-WINNING CREDIT CARD


Monzo Flex is a credit card you can count on. It gives you real-time balance updates, a credit limit up to £3,000 and a 0% offer you can use time and time again.

Monzo Flex was voted Best Credit Card at the 2024 Card & Payments Awards

• Protect eligible purchases made with the Flex card with Section 75 Protection
• Apply from your Monzo bank account. Eligibility criteria and Ts&Cs apply. 18+ year olds only. Not keeping up with payments may negatively impact your credit score.
• Representative example: 29% APR representative (variable). £1200 credit limit. 29% yearly interest (variable).



MONZO BUSINESS: IT JUST WORKS, SO YOU CAN TOO

Monzo Business Banking helps small businesses stay on top of their finances. Voted Best Business Banking Provider at the 2024 British Bank Awards.


• Manage money for your business with no monthly fee or go Business Pro for £9 per month with automatic Tax Pots, integrated accounting, multi-user access for limited companies, invoicing and more
• Make international payments from your bank account (powered by Wise, fees apply)
• Only sole traders and limited company directors in the UK can apply. Ts&Cs apply.



Your eligible deposits in Monzo are protected by The Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) up to a value of £85,000 per person.

Registered address: Broadwalk House, 5 Appold St, London EC2A 2AG

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

The UK's most trusted credit score* is available for free. Get free access to a wide range of our services, from credit score checks, credit card comparison & eligibility and personal loan comparison & eligibility.

Your Experian Credit Score is a straightforward way of showing how lenders may view your application. As part of a credit check, companies may look to see whether you’ve paid back your credit on time, how much credit you currently have and how you’re managing it. The better your credit score the better your chances are of getting a credit card, loan or even a mortgage, along with great rates for each.

Compare credit cards and loans with us. Let Experian help by showing you the credit cards and personal loans you’re most likely to be accepted for, helping you save hassle and avoid too many unsuccessful applications impacting your credit rating.

Experian is a credit broker not a lender†, so we show you impartial search results.

Free Experian account features:
• Your Experian Credit Score on the go
• Credit card and loan comparison
• Summary of your total credit
• See how likely you are to get accepted for personal loans and credit cards before applying
• Tips, articles, videos and expert knowledge to improve your suitability for credit checks at your fingertips
• Quick and easy login with Touch/Face ID or PIN

CreditExpert subscribers get access to these additional features:
• Personalised tips on how to improve your credit score
• Score Influencers show you what’s positively and negatively affecting your Experian Credit Score
• Get your Experian Credit Score & Report updated daily
• Alerts notify of you credit score changes 
• UK call support for credit report & score
• Timeline shows you a single view of your score history and alerts
• Web monitoring
• Dedicated fraud support

Checking your Experian Credit Score regularly won't affect your credit report or credit rating. What's more, the app search covers a range of selected credit cards and loans.

*Most trusted’ based on 59% of 1086 respondents. ICM Unlimited survey, June 2018.

†Experian acts as a credit broker and not a lender in the provision of its credit cards and personal, car finance and guarantor loans comparison services, meaning it will show you products offered by lenders and other brokers.

Experian acts independently and although our comparison service shows products for a range of lenders and other brokers it does not cover the whole of the market, meaning other products may be available to you. Comparison services are provided free however we will receive commission payments from lenders or brokers we introduce you to.

All free and paid for Experian consumer services are provided by Experian Ltd (Registered number 653331). Experian Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (firm reference number 738097). Experian Ltd is registered in England and Wales with registered office at The Sir John Peace Building, Experian Way, NG2 Business Park, Nottingham, NG80 1ZZ. The web monitoring feature and its alerts within CreditExpert is not Financial Conduct Authority regulated activity.

Join over 11 million customers and download our NatWest mobile banking app today to make your day-to-day banking easy, quick and secure.

Why the NatWest app?

Manage your money easily and securely:
•	Apply for current, savings, child, teen, premier and student accounts quickly. Eligibility criteria apply.
•	See all your bank accounts straight from your home screen.
•	Freeze and unfreeze your card at any time (Mastercard only).
•	Set up touch, voice or face ID for better security and send high value payments in-app, amend payment limits and more. Touch, voice and face ID are only available on selected devices. Optic ID is also available on Apple Vision Pro.

Send, receive and access money quickly:
•	Request money via a QR code or link.
•	Send money faster with a personalised list of favourite payees.
•	Split a bill up to £500 by sharing a payment request link with multiple people at once. (Eligible current accounts only. Payment requests can be sent to anyone with an eligible account with a participating UK bank and uses online or mobile banking. Paying bank criteria and limits may apply.)
•	iPhone only: Get Cash in emergencies with a unique code without using your card. You can withdraw up to £130 every 24 hours at our branded ATMs. You must have a least £10 available in your account and an active debit card (locked or unlocked).

Stay on top of your spending and saving:
•	Keep track of payments all in one place.
•	Save your spare change with Round Ups if you have an eligible current account and instant access savings account. Round Ups can only be made on debit card and contactless payments in Sterling.
•	Budget easily by managing your monthly spending and set categories.
•	Turn on push notifications to get alerted when money reaches or leaves your account.

Get support for every life event:
•	Spend abroad in Euros and US Dollars without fees or charges by applying for a Travel account. You must have enough money in your travel account. To apply for a Travel account, you need an eligible sole current account and to be over 18. Other terms and fees may apply.
•	Get updates on your credit score and insight on how to improve it. Your credit score data is provided by TransUnion and is only available to customers over 18, with a UK address.
•	Discover our additional products and services, including mortgages, home and life insurance and loans, in one place.
•	Fast track your money goals with the help of our handy plans, tools and tips.

Important info

Please note, the app contains images when logging in that may cause a reaction in individuals who are photosensitive. You can switch these off for your device by visiting the settings menu and the accessibility menu where you will be able to find motion and visual control settings within the menu (note this is not within our app, but in the settings of your device itself).

Our app is available to customers aged 11+ with a UK or international mobile number in specific countries. Be aware that some features and products have age restrictions and are only available if you’re over 16 or 18.

By downloading this app, you’re accepting our Terms and Conditions, which can be viewed at natwest.com/mobileterms.

Please save or print a copy along with the Privacy Policy for your record.

BE THE BOSS OF YOUR MONEY
Manage your money with confidence, whenever and wherever you need. Join our 10 million App users – get the app and get started.

Seeing your balance, paying a bill or checking your transactions are just the start. Here’s some of the great stuff we’ve got going on in the App.

SPEND? SAVE? BORROW? INSURE? INVEST? APPLY IN THE APP TODAY
-	Not yet banking with us? Don’t worry – download the App, it’s the quickest and easiest way to apply for a bank account with us.
-	You can share documents with us in real-time using your built-in camera to complete your application quickly.

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR EVERYDAY SPENDING
-	Ever fallen into the subscription trap after that free trial? See, block and cancel subscriptions anytime.
-	Need to settle up or transfer money fast? With Faster Payments you can sort it in quick time.
-	Splitting the bill? Friend forgot their card? Request and receive money you’re owed from family and friends using ‘Request a Payment’.
-	Get support all day and night, every day. 

STAY IN THE KNOW WITH REAL TIME INSIGHTS
-	Know what’s going on with your money in real-time, with upcoming payments and instant notifications when money’s coming in and going out.
-	Wondering where your money goes? See where you’re spending and where you might be able to save, with Spending Insights.

MAKE YOUR MONEY WORK HARDER FOR YOU
-	Enjoy a cheeky bargain or three with Everyday Offers. Earn cashback of up to 15% from a range of retailers with our current accounts and credit cards.
-	Turn your pennies to pounds – using ‘Save the Change’. We’ll round up your debit card spend to the nearest pound and move it into a chosen savings account with us. 
-	Keep track of your credit score for free, with helpful tips and tools to improve it.

KEEPING YOU AND YOUR MONEY SAFE
-	Use your fingerprint or face to login - it’s the fastest and most secure way to bank.
-	Whether your card is lost, stolen or turned into a chew toy, you can relax knowing you can freeze it, unfreeze it or order a new one in seconds.
-	With the latest security tech we keep your money safe and stop those pesky hackers in their tracks.
-	Your eligible deposits with Lloyds are protected up to £85,000 by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. Find out more at lloydsbank.com/FSCS

LEAVE US A REVIEW ABOUT OUR APP
We’re always ready to listen and make things better for you.

Lloyds and Lloyds Bank are trading names of Lloyds Bank Plc (registered in England and Wales (no. 2065), registered office: 25 Gresham Street, London EC2V 7HN). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 119278.

The app is available to customers with a UK personal bank account and valid registered phone number.
 
LEGAL INFORMATION
This app is designed and intended for Lloyds UK customers to access and service UK personal products, and for customers of Lloyds Bank Corporate Markets plc, using the business names Lloyds Bank International and Lloyds Bank International Private Banking, to access and service personal products held in Jersey, Guernsey and the Isle of Man. It should only be downloaded for this purpose.

While the app can be downloaded from App Stores outside the UK, this does not mean we are inviting, offering or recommending you engage in any transactions or establish a customer relationship with Lloyds or Lloyds Bank Corporate Markets plc.

Any confirmation that our product or service complies with European Union law is made to Apple to meet this legal requirement. This does not imply any representation, warranty, or statement to you and should not be relied upon for entering into any contract.

The Barclays app

HOW TO REGISTER
If you’re 16 or over and you have a UK-registered mobile number and a UK Barclays current account or Barclaycard, you can register for the app. You’ll need the 16 digit number off your card, then follow the onscreen instructions. Some customers may be required to verify their identity with a PINsentry card reader.
 
If you’ve got an activation code, follow the onscreen steps to register (you won’t need PINsentry for this).
 
After you’re set up, you’ll only need your 5-digit passcode to log in. Then you can set up Touch ID or Face ID to log in faster in future.
 
THE BENEFITS
• Log in quickly and securely when you set up access through Touch ID or Face ID
• Manage your personal, business and corporate accounts, including your Barclaycard accounts, and view your Barclays mortgage account
• See recent transactions and check your balances
• Make payments to new and existing payees, transfer money between accounts or transfer a balance to your Barclaycard
• Delete Direct Debits
• Set up, edit and delete standing orders using your app
• Join Barclays Blue Rewards and earn rewards just for banking with us
• Store your documents securely with Barclays Cloud It
• Find your nearest branch or cash machine
• Use Mobile PINsentry. It can take up to 4 days for this feature to be activated in the app while we complete some security checks
• Call us straight from the app to speak to an adviser
• Our iPhone app has been accredited by AbilityNet – the charity that assesses digital services for accessibility 

Terms and conditions apply. You must be aged 16 or over to use the Barclays app.
 
FOR BUSINESS ACCOUNTS
You can only use the app if you’re a sole-signatory Barclays Business current account holder. You can’t register your Barclaycard business or corporate credit cards.
 
This app is provided by either Barclays Bank UK PLC or Barclays Bank PLC depending on the entity you may have contracted with for banking services. Please refer to your bank documents (terms and conditions, statements, etc) to confirm the legal entity that provides banking services to you. 
 
Copyright © Barclays 2025. Barclays is a registered trade mark of Barclays plc, used under licence.

Hi, we're Zable. Download our app to join over 1 million of our credit card and loan customers.


Rated 'Excellent' On TrustPilot:


- Quick eligibility check: it won't affect your credit score

- Apply in minutes: simple, straightforward, paperless card and loan application

- Manage your money: credit card transactions, loan payments, and credit score

- Repay card in minutes: make card payments in the app

- Apple Pay: most approved customers are eligible for a virtual card immediately

- Credit score: see your Equifax score

- Credit that grows with you: we automatically review your account for credit limit increases and let you know when you're eligible

- No hidden card fees: at home or abroad

- Simple to use: manage your card or loan in the app


Zable Credit Card:


Track your credit, spending, score, and payments all in one place on our simple, easy-to-use app. Zable cards are available with Apple Pay, and most approved customers enjoy instant access to start spending right away.


Zable Loan:


The loan application process is paperless and fast – complete your application in our app and you could potentially receive your loan the same day. You can customise your loan amount and term, providing flexibility and control over your loan.


Credit Score:


Access your Equifax credit score for free, gaining valuable insights into your credit score history and the factors affecting your credit score and eligibility for a loan or card.


Zable Credit Card: Representative 48.9% APR (variable)

Zable Loan: Representative 32.5% APR (fixed)

Our loans involve fixed monthly payments over a set period, between one to five years. If you would like to change your repayment schedule or make early repayments for your personal loan, you can do so with ease (and without incurring a fee) via our app.

We're authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority as Lendable Ltd with reference 720261. Zable is a trading name of Lendable Ltd.

Earn money as an online tester? As often and whenever you want?

Join Germany's largest platform for paid online jobs and join over 2,900,000 online testers.

After signing up for free, you'll immediately have access to countless online surveys.

- Earn over USD 850 directly after download, whether on the go or from the comfort of your home, maximum flexibility guaranteed.
- Choose from the largest assortment in the German-speaking area, orders that fit you exactly.
- You will be regularly invited to the latest surveys.
- Orders with multi goals allow you to achieve higher earnings through continuous testing.
- Fast and secure payout: Get paid within 24 hours.
- Upgrade to a premium tester and earn exclusive access to higher-paying assignments.
- Tested, Verified, Recommended! We value authenticity and trustworthiness. Not for nothing we are recommended by Verbraucherschutz.de. In addition, testerup.com is certified with the TÜV - eKomi rating of 4.3/5.

Meet Emma, your ultimate budgeting app

Take full control of your money with Emma, the award-winning budget planner and budget tracker that helps you save money, manage bills, and invest smarter. Whether you’re budgeting for groceries, rent, or saving for your next big goal, Emma gives you all the tools to build healthier financial habits. Trusted by hundreds of thousands of users across the UK, Emma makes budgeting simple and effective.

Why Choose Emma

Emma combines all your bank accounts, credit cards, investments, and crypto wallets into one intuitive dashboard. You’ll always know where your money goes and how to stick to your budget with ease.

Key Features

Budgeting Made Easy
Create unlimited budgets with custom categories, track overspending with rolling budgets, and sync your plan with your pay cycle. Emma even supports merchant-based budgets, making it the most flexible budget app in the UK.

Powerful Insights & Analytics
Understand your spending with interactive pie charts, cash flow timelines, and spend-over-time breakdowns. Emma helps you budget smarter by showing exactly where your money goes.

Smart Budget Alerts
Get real-time notifications when you’re close to your budget limits, a bill is due, or an unusual transaction occurs.

Bill & Subscription Tracking
Never miss a payment again. Track bills, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and free up money in your budget instantly.

Smart Savings with Autosave

Build your savings alongside your budget with three flexible options:
• Custom Deposit: Set a recurring amount to save automatically
• Round Ups: Save spare change from daily purchases
• AI Saving: Let Emma calculate the perfect savings for your budget

Cashback & Rewards
Earn free cashback at top UK brands and stretch your budget further.

Boost Your Credit Score
Report your rent to Equifax, TransUnion, and Experian directly from Emma and improve your credit score while staying on budget.

Personal & Business Budgeting
Use Emma Spaces to manage personal and business budgets in one app, keeping everything organised.

Shared Budgets Made Simple
Split expenses with friends, housemates, or a partner using Emma Groups—no more awkward money chats.

Track Your Net Worth
Monitor assets and liabilities in real time and see how your overall budget and wealth grow.

Discover Better Financial Options
Compare loans, credit cards, and debt consolidation offers tailored to your budget.

Invest Commission-Free
Trade over 1,800 US stocks, including Apple, Meta, and NVIDIA. Capital at risk; other fees may apply.

Bank-Level Security

Your data is safe with Emma:
* 256-bit SSL encryption
* Biometric authentication
* FCA-registered and ICO-compliant
* Featured by BBC, Financial Times, TechCrunch, The Guardian, and more.

Subscriptions
Emma Plus, Pro, and Ultimate plans are available monthly or annually. Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the billing period. Manage your plan directly in your Emma account settings. Prices start at £4.99/month and may vary by country.

Regulatory Information
Emma Technologies Ltd (Company No. 10578464) is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN 794952) under the Payment Services Regulations 2017. Appointed Representative of RiskSave Technologies Ltd (FRN 775330)
Introducer Appointed Representative of Quint Group Ltd (FRN 669450)
Registered with the Information Commissioner’s Office (ZA241546)

Terms and Conditions: emma-app.com/terms
Privacy Policy: emma-app.com/privacy

Download Emma today,  the UK’s favourite budget app and join thousands of users who save money, stay on budget, improve their credit score, and build financial confidence every day.

Welcome to the new Hastings Direct app, which is packed full of features designed to take the hassle out of managing your insurance. You’ll find your policy details and insurance documents as well as contact numbers and claims tips all stored safely and securely in the app to access whenever and wherever you need them.

So, whether you want to manage your policy, need help if you’ve broken down or have to make a claim you can get the help you need, quickly.

MANAGE YOUR POLICY:

- One-click links to important information for your Hastings Direct, Premier, Essentials and YouDrive polices – quick access to your policy number, what you’re covered for, excesses and renewal date*
- Something changed? Update your car, address or add a new driver in a few easy steps*
- Need more information and hate rummaging through paperwork? Keep all your key documents in one place that’s accessible 24/7*
- View your car, home, van and bike policies all in one place
- Constantly forgetting passwords? Switch to Touch ID / Face ID or a 6-digit pin
- Stay safe - Customise security features and read our privacy policy

BREAKDOWN ASSISTANCE:

- Get help when you need it most – Hit ‘click to call’ and you’ll connect directly to your breakdown provider

CLAIMS:
- Need to make a claim? Use the app to register a claim
- Got a query about an existing claim? Our app will help you find the answer
- Get in touch directly - Send important information to us via email

We’re working hard to release lots of exciting new functions to help make your life that little bit easier, so make sure you keep your app updated. If you’ve got any suggestions on how we can improve the app or if you require technical support, please email mobileappsupport@hastingsdirect.com.

Disclaimer

Minimum Hastings Direct app requirements:

- iOS 12.0 or newer
- Phone must not previously or currently be jailbroken**

*Customers with policies beginning with ‘H’ are automatically redirected to our mobile website to view or change their policy
**allowing root access to files which remove all restrictions from the phone


Hastings Insurance Services Limited, trading as Hastings Direct, is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (register number 311492).

Quick, handy, safe and packed with brilliant features that can help with managing your finances.

INTRODUCING… THE CAPITAL ONE APP

This isn’t just another credit card app. But then, we would say that. Right?

So it’s a good job all the customers dropping 5 star reviews on here seem to agree. (About 4 out of 5 reviews hit top marks.)

WHY SO MANY FIVE STAR REVIEWS?

We listen to you (as in all 2 million of our app-using customers). And then make features based on what you need. The kind of things that let you stop wasting time filling in forms or rolling your eyes while waiting on phone lines.

Take a look at a few of the things you can do in the app:

• Set up and change your Direct Debits
• Sign in with Face or Touch ID or a passcode
• Temporarily block a card or report it lost or stolen
• Make payments and find out when your next payment is due

Join over 6 million of our customers who are using the Nationwide banking app for their everyday banking needs. It’s simple to get started.

# I’ve never used the app before. How do I start? #
Download the Nationwide banking app and follow the instructions on screen, you’ll need your Nationwide account details or customer number.
You can log in with Face ID, Touch ID or passnumber if your device allows.
Once you have set up biometrics on your account, you will be able to confirm new payments with Face ID or Touch ID. We will ask you to take a selfie. We might still need to verify your identity using your card reader, so please keep it somewhere safe just in case.

# How safe is the Nationwide banking app? #
Our Digital Banking promise means:
• We'll refund any money taken from your account without your authorisation
• We'll monitor and protect your account 24/7 with the latest technology
• We'll provide you with education on how to stay safe including top tips and information on the latest fraud and scam trends

Please see our website for full terms and conditions. T&Cs apply.

# You can use the app to: #

• View your accounts and statements; savings, loans, mortgages, credit cards and current accounts.
• Browse our product offerings, and open new accounts.
• Customise your banking app home screen. You can choose slimmer account tiles to see more on your screen.
• Manage your payments – set up, cancel and amend standing orders in the app. You can cancel Direct Debits too.
• Authenticate transactions in the internet bank and when shopping online.
• Report lost, stolen or damaged cards. You can also freeze / unfreeze your debit card.
• Add your cards to Apple Pay.
• Download copies of your monthly statements for some accounts.
• Search for or scan transactions at a glance. The app shows you pending transactions and includes easy identifiers such as brand logos and the organisation’s location and contact details.
• Set savings goals and your own contactless payment limits. You can also turn off contactless payments.
• Round up your spending and save the extra directly into your savings account.
• If you ever find gambling becomes a problem for you, use the app to set a gambling block.
• Personalise your settings to update your personal details, get text alerts and go paperless.

THE SMART WAY TO PAY
Need a little help managing your money? You can Pay over 6 weeks at loads of stores with no fees, like eBay and Amazon. All you need to do is enable your card in the app before you shop. Add Zilch to your digital wallet and you can Pay over time anywhere else – online or in-store – for a fee of up to £3.50.

PAY OVER 3 MONTHS

INSTANT REWARDS
Get up to 5% back in Zilch Rewards when you enable your card to pay in full before checkout. You’ll also receive up to 0.5% back in Zilch Rewards when you use Zilch Anywhere or if you Tap and Pay in-store. Zilch supports Apple Pay, Google Pay and Samsung Pay.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
1. Explore the app to find where you want to shop
2. Can’t find your store? Tap Zilch Anywhere
3. Choose whether you want to Pay now or spread the cost
4. Tap Enable card, then we’ll automatically take you to your chosen store, so you can fill your basket and check out

BUILD YOUR CREDIT SCORE
Use Zilch regularly and keep up with your repayments and you could see your credit score increase over time.

GROW YOUR CREDIT
Get a credit limit tailored to you and we’ll give you easy-to-follow steps that could see your credit rise. Responsibly.

HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT
Our dedicated Customer Support team are available to answer your queries 9am–6pm, seven days a week.

NEED MORE TIME TO PAY?
If you need some help with your cash flow, just hit Snooze and you’ll get 4 or 8 extra days to pay. Subject to eligibility. Fees may apply.

ABOUT ZILCH
We’re on a mission to eliminate the cost of consumer credit. For good. Since launching in the UK in September 2020 and in the US in May 2022, Zilch has hit over 5 million customers. In that time, we've provided our customers with over £750 million in aggregate Rewards and savings on fees and interest. Zilch is Europe’s fastest-ever company to go from Series A to double-unicorn status, in just 14 months, after raising capital at a $2bn valuation in November 2021 and maintaining that valuation in a subsequent funding round.

PRIVACY POLICY
Zilch Technology Limited is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. We only retain your personal data for as long as reasonably necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, including to satisfy any legal, regulatory, tax, accounting or reporting requirements. Zilch is using the latest data security measures to protect your personal info and financial data.

The HSBC UK Mobile Banking app has been created to help our UK customers with their everyday banking on the go. Download it today and you can:
•	Log on quickly and securely with Face ID or Touch ID
•	Make payments and check your balances on the go
•	Pay in one or more cheques up to a limit of £2,000 per day
•	View or cancel standing orders and Direct Debits
•	Freeze, report lost and order a replacement card
•	View your debit or credit card PIN
•	Stay in control with our Spending insights
•	View and manage bills easily with Balance .

How to log on to Mobile Banking
•	If you’re registered for HSBC Online Banking, you can use your existing details
•	If you’re not yet registered, simply download the app, then select ‘Register now’.
Access all your essential banking services on the go. Download the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app today.

Want to know more?
Log on quickly and securely
Face ID and Touch ID mean you can use your face or fingerprint to quickly log on to the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app, without having to enter a password.
Once you’re logged on, your Mobile Banking PIN adds another layer of protection against fraud. To authorise new transactions, use your Mobile Banking PIN or biometrics on supported devices.

Send money
The HSBC UK Mobile Banking app lets you send money to family or friends using their account details. Pay bills with pre-populated bank details for hundreds of major businesses. And instantly transfer money between your personal accounts.

Mobile statements
With the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app, you can securely access your current account, savings and credit card statements.

Mobile cheque deposits
The HSBC UK Mobile Banking app lets you pay in cheques without going to a branch by selecting the account, entering the value then scanning the front and back of the cheque. Please keep any cheques until they show in your account. You can pay in one or more cheques up to a limit of £2,000 per day. Cheques deposited before 10pm on a working day will be available by 11:59pm the next working day.

Freeze your card
Ever lost your card, only for it to turn up the moment you cancelled it? With the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app, you can place a temporary block on your card with just a few taps. It will stay blocked until you unblock it, or it can be reported as lost or stolen.

Balance After Bills
Balance After Bills helps you plan your finances from one payday to the next. It shows you how much you could have left for the month ahead, once scheduled bills like standing orders, Direct Debits, credit cards, loans and mortgages are taken into account.

Chat with us
Need help or assistance? Select the ‘Start chat’ window on the home screen or tap 'Chat with us' in the ‘Library’. If you have push notifications enabled for the HSBC Mobile Banking app, we’ll send you an alert when we reply. 

Gambling restriction
You can choose to restrict transactions made to gambling businesses, such as casinos and online betting companies, and recurring transactions such as The Postcode Lottery. The block only applies to individual cards held in your name.

Our app is there for you, whether you’re on the move, at work or just relaxing at home. Tap, log in and check your balance, make payments or plan for your next big dream. Being there for you, it’s a people thing.

FEEL AT HOME

•	Use your face or fingerprint to log in faster and more securely.
•	Just open the app and explore your spaces to get quick access to everything you need, from statements to investments.

NO CARD? NO WORRIES

•	Whether your card is lost, stolen or simply misplaced, relax knowing you can freeze it, order a new one, or look up your card details.

BE IN THE KNOW

•	Stay ahead of your bills - your upcoming payments summary lets you know what’s being paid and when.
•	Spending insights helps you understand where your money goes every month.
•	Check your credit score and get personalised hints and tips to help you stay in control of your money and move closer to your big dreams, like getting a new home.
•	Never miss important updates again: personalise your notifications to stay on top of everything.

IN FOR A PENNY

•	Make every penny count with Save the Change. It rounds up what you spend on your debit card to the nearest pound and moves the change into a savings account.
•	Get cashback from your favourite retailers with Everyday Offers.

CONTACTING YOU

We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from Halifax.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

We don't charge you to use our services, but your mobile operator might charge for some things, such as downloading or using the app, so please check with them. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality.

When you use this app, we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services.

The app is available to customers with a UK personal account and valid registered phone number. IOS14 or above required. Device registration required. Terms and conditions apply.

Freeze and unfreeze certain types of transactions securely 24/7 for extra peace of mind or if you’ve temporarily misplaced your card.

Touch ID requires at least iPhone 6s running iOS 14.0 or above or iPad (5th generation), iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, or iPad mini 3 (or later models). Face ID requires either iPhone X or later models, or iPad Pro with Face ID capability (2018 onwards).

Your bank in your pocket. It starts here. 

Not a Santander customer already? Well hi there!  Come on in and make yourself at home. Simply download the App and we'll guide you through an application to join us* 

Already a customer? Nice one! You can get started by using your usual log on details (Don't already have log on details? Visit santander.co.uk to register – it's quick & easy) 

Now, we're pretty proud of our App and we've got good reason to be - it's award winning* Not only that, but it's secure, fast and you can use it anywhere, anytime, which is great if you're bit of a night owl. 

Here's the basic lowdown on what you can do: 

•            check your balance and statements. We know, it's a pretty scary task to do after a big night out  

•            not sure if you've already paid for something? Search transactions will let you find out instantly 

•            transfer money between your Santander accounts. Perfect if you want to put some spare cash away for a rainy day, or save for that new car  

•            send money to other people. Which is great if you're splitting the bill  

•            check your Direct Debits and standing orders 

•            control your card, 'freeze' it in those moments where you're sure your cards somewhere in the house, just not sure where 

•            pay in cheques, up to £5k a day 

•            we've got some handy features like My Money Manager and My Home Manager. Let’s just say it'll make things a lot more 'insightful' 

•            thanks to biometrics, payment authorisation and discreet mode you can rest easy knowing you're banking securely.  

But you can do so much more too!

That's enough reading for now, let's get stuck in. Tap "Download" and see for yourself.

Open your free Chase account to discover the potential of your money, with our award-winning bank.  


Enjoy instant-access savings with interest paid monthly 
Open a Chase saver account and you'll enjoy a competitive interest rate with instant access (2), to help you get to your goals sooner. 

Get 1% cashback with your current account
That's 1% cashback when you use your debit card to buy some of your essentials, for your first 12 months with us (3). 
	
Spend, save and invest – all in one place
Manage your spending, savings and investments all through the Chase app – to help you see what your money can do (1). With investing, capital at risk.

Enjoy around-the-clock support from real people
With just a few taps in the app, you'll be through to someone who can answer your questions, 24/7.

See where your money's going and growing with handy insights
Compare your spending month-on-month and get to know how you spend – it could help you spot opportunities to save and invest for the future.

Zero fees or charges from us
Withdraw cash and spend abroad with a transparent exchange rate and no extra fees or mark-ups from us – so you have that little bit extra to enjoy while you're away. Cash withdrawal limits do apply, though.

Earn 5% interest on a round-up account
An effortless way to move a little closer to your savings goals every day. Simply choose to round up your debit card spending to the nearest £1, and we'll boost your spare change by putting it in a round-up account. It'll give you 5% AER (4.89% gross) variable interest, paid monthly (4).

Organise your money, your way
Open extra saver accounts for free to keep track of both big and small goals. 

Ready to use right away
Spend online with your in-app card details or add us to your Apple Wallet as soon as your account is open. No need to wait for your card to arrive.

Good to know
To bank with us, you must: be 18+, be a resident of the UK only, have a smartphone and a UK mobile number, and be a tax resident of the UK.

Legal bits

(1) 18+, UK residents. Chase current account required - eligibility applies. Investment products are provided by J.P. Morgan Personal Investing and are not guaranteed by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A.
(2) 18+, UK residents. Chase current account required. T&Cs apply (see chase.co.uk/gb/en/legal/chase-saver-account-terms-and-conditions/).
